title: Naruto
bio: Masashi Kishimoto is a renowned Japanese manga artist and writer, best known for creating the hit series Naruto. His work has inspired millions and shaped modern shonen manga.

title: One Piece
bio: Eiichiro Oda is a legendary Japanese manga artist, best known as the creator of One Piece, one of the best-selling and most influential manga series of all time.

title: Attack on Titan
bio: Hajime Isayama is a Japanese manga artist best known for creating Attack on Titan, a dark, gripping series that gained global acclaim for its intense story and unique world.

title: Demon Slayer
bio: Koyoharu Gotouge is a Japanese manga artist best known for creating Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, a massively popular series praised for its art, emotion, and storytelling.

title: My Hero Academia
bio: Kōhei Horikoshi is a Japanese manga artist known for My Hero Academia, a superhero-themed manga blending classic shonen elements with modern society and emotional depth, earning worldwide popularity.

title: Dragon Ball Z
bio: Akira Toriyama is a legendary manga artist, best known for creating Dragon Ball. His unique art style and storytelling helped define action manga and influenced generations of artists worldwide.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
bio: Hiromu Arakawa is a celebrated manga artist, best known for Fullmetal Alchemist. Her balanced mix of action, emotion, and philosophy earned the series immense respect and critical acclaim.

title: Sword Art Online
bio: Rei Kawahara, also known as Reki Kawahara, is the creator of Sword Art Online, a light novel and manga series exploring virtual reality, gaming, and psychological conflict in futuristic worlds.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
bio: Sui Ishida is a Japanese manga artist acclaimed for Tokyo Ghoul, a dark fantasy exploring identity, morality, and horror in a world where ghouls and humans struggle for survival.
